scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development && yarn run clean && parcel serve -p 1234 ./src/index.html
scripts.build: yarn run clean && NODE_ENV=production parcel build ./src/index.html --no-cache --no-source-maps --public-url ./
scripts.deploy: yarn run clean && yarn run build && git subtree split --prefix dist -b gh-pages && git push -f origin gh-pages:gh-pages && git checkout master && git branch -D gh-pages
